Thank you for installing LightGuard! Your screen brightness and contrast are now easily manageable.

ðŸš€ Getting Started
- Check the System Tray: LightGuard runs in the background! Find its icon in the bottom-right system tray.
- Customize Your Settings: Adjust automatic scheduling, custom brightness levels, and keyboard shortcuts in the settings menu.
- Enable Auto-Start: Configure LightGuard to launch automatically when your computer starts.
